input.sentences: when i got to the awards ceremony last week i arrived late .
they were already halfway through the event .
most of the soldiers had already left .
only a few were still there .
i only got to listen to one speaker .
output.sentences: Friends and family gathered to see their children graduate from military academy.
The recruit flag was ceremoniously presented.
Lots of marching and drills showed off what the young men and women had earned.
All of the graduates looked sharp in their uniforms.
The valedictorian thanked everyone for helping them to become successful, well-prepared graduates.
